X0000-0.question: Are you within normal limits?
X0000-0.instructions: if patient is within normal limits , select true otherwise false

X0000-1.question: Are you Diabetic?
X0000-1.instructions: if patient is diabetic, select true otherwise false

X0000-2.question: Are you dependant on Insulin?
X0000-2.instructions: if patient is dependant on insulin, select true otherwise false

X0000-3.question: Are you able to draw up a correct dose of insulin independently?
X0000-3.instructions: if patient is able to draw up a correct dose of insulin independently, select true otherwise false

X0000-4.question: Can you properly administer your own insulin?
X0000-4.instructions: if patient has can properly administer their own insulin, select true otherwise false

X0000-5.question: Are you taking an oral hypoglycemic agent?
X0000-5.instructions: if patient is taking a oral hypoglycemic agent, select true otherwise false

X0000-6.question: Is your caregiver able to draw up and administer insulin
X0000-6.instructions: if care giver is able to draw up and administer insulin, select true, if there is no caregiver select N/A otherwise false

X0000-7.question: Is your caregiver independant with glucometer use
X0000-7.instructions: if the caregiver is independant with glucometer use, select true, if there is no caregiver select N/A otherwise false

X0000-8.question: Do you or your caregiver routinely perform inspection of your lower extremities?
X0000-8.instructions: if patient or caregiver performs a routine inspection of your lower extremity, select true otherwise false

X0000-9.question: Do you have any endocrine related problems
X0000-9.instructions: If patient has provided with any endocrine related problems, select true otherwise false

X0000-10.question: Could you tell me your blood sugar levels?
X0000-10.instructions: If patient has provided with the blood sugar levels, select true otherwise false

X0000-11.question: Can you tell me who your blood sugar was checked by?
X0000-11.instructions: If patient has provided information of their blood sugar was checked by, then select true otherwise false

X0000-12.question: At which site was your blood sugar checked at?
X0000-12.instructions: If patient has provided information of where their blood sugar was checked at, then select true otherwise false

X0000-13.question: Do you have any further comments?
X0000-13.instructions: If patient has provided addition information then select true otherwise false
